Events that occurred on 6 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1914 - J.R.R. Tolkien begins working on The Book of Ishness.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 53b.
1965 â€“ J.R.R. Tolkien receives a fan letter from Iris Murdoch.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his grandson Michael George, published as Letter 266.
1966 - A.R. Rahman, composer of The Lord of the Rings (musical), is born.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Paula Coston
1992 - The Tolkien Family Album is published.
1992 - Sauron Defeated is published in the UK.
1997 - A new edition of The Monsters and the Critics is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
